Hero.title: Authentiq - <important>Expense Justification Platform</important> for NGOs
Hero.description: Streamline your expense validation process with AI-powered document verification and multi-tenant management.

Features.section_description: Authentiq provides comprehensive expense justification and document verification tools designed specifically for NGOs.
Features.feature_description: Automate your expense validation process with intelligent document analysis and multi-level approval workflows.

Pricing.section_title: Affordable Plans for NGOs of All Sizes
Pricing.section_description: Choose the plan that fits your organization's needs with transparent, NGO-friendly pricing.

FAQ.question1: How does Authentiq handle multi-organization management?
FAQ.answer1: Authentiq provides comprehensive multi-tenant architecture allowing NGOs to manage multiple organizations, projects, and teams under a single account with separate data isolation and role-based access controls.
FAQ.question2: What document security and compliance measures are in place?
FAQ.answer2: Authentiq employs bank-level encryption, secure document storage, audit trails, and compliance with international data protection standards to ensure your expense documents remain secure and confidential.
FAQ.question3: Can Authentiq integrate with our existing accounting systems?
FAQ.answer3: Yes, Authentiq offers API integrations with popular accounting software and can export data in multiple formats (CSV, Excel, PDF) for seamless integration with your existing financial systems.
FAQ.question4: Does Authentiq support multiple languages for international NGOs?
FAQ.answer4: Absolutely. Authentiq supports multiple languages and can be configured to work with different currencies and regional compliance requirements for global NGO operations.
FAQ.question5: How does the AI-powered document verification work?
FAQ.answer5: Our AI analyzes uploaded expense documents using OCR technology to extract key information, verify authenticity, flag potential issues, and automatically categorize expenses according to your organization's policies.
FAQ.question6: What kind of support is available for NGOs?
FAQ.answer6: We provide dedicated NGO support including onboarding assistance, training resources, and priority support to ensure your team can effectively use Authentiq for your expense management needs.
